body.name: Evenflo Omni Plus Modular Travel System with LiteMax Sport Rear-Facing Infant Car Seat (Brizo Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 52 mins
features: 50% Steel 22% Polyester 16% PA 6% Polypropylene 4% Aluminum 2% POM
GROW WITH 6-WAY VERSATILITY: Configures multiple ways to fit your child’s age and stage, including rear-facing or forward-facing, as well as infant car seat, carriage mode or toddler mode
KEEP BABY CLOSE: Seats baby higher when in toddler mode, bringing baby closer to you as you stroll while creating extra storage space below
GET COMFY COZY: Converts from toddler mode to carriage mode to allow babies under 6 months of age to stretch out

LOOK AT WHAT’S NEW!: New huge storage basket offers you an extra foot of space and holds up to 10 lb of on-the-go essentials. In addition, Omni Plus is compatible with the Evenflo Child Snack Tray (sold separately)!
FOLD AND GO: Stroller folds into a compact, self-standing position in seconds to make packing up a lot more convenient
GET THE COMPLETE PACKAGE: The travel system puts it all together for you — a modular stroller with the Evenflo LiteMax Sport Infant Car Seat (for infants weighing from 4 to 35 lb)
body.description: You’ll love the way the Evenflo® Omni™ Plus Modular Travel System with the Evenflo LiteMax™ Sport Rear-Facing Infant Car Seat puts a whole new spin on versatility. An all-new frame design coupled with an exciting new look and upgrades are sure to increase your options, convenience and flexibility. Designed for children up to 50 lb, the stroller now includes a higher toddler seat, allowing you to stay closer to your little love bug while creating more usable storage below. When your child becomes more curious, you can switch to the forward-facing position. Additional updates include self-standing fold capability, large cruiser tires, an extra foot of storage to hold essentials, and a parent cupholder with handy locking tab. More good news: the Omni Plus now accepts the Evenflo Child Snack Tray (sold separately), so your child can nibble on the go. As a travel system, Omni Plus includes everything you need from babyhood through the toddler years. It includes the Evenflo LiteMax Sport Rear-Facing Infant Car Seat, featuring harness covers for baby’s comfort, removable body pillow and an integrated belt lock-off system. Lightweight yet feature-rich, the new Omni Plus builds on its strengths to give you even more of what you need on your parenthood journey. At Evenflo, we go above and beyond government standards to create car seats that are safe. The Evenflo LiteMax Sport Rear-Facing Infant Car Seat meets all applicable federal safety standards. It is rollover tested, temperature tested, and structural integrity tested at energy levels approximately 2x the federal crash test standard. If you need help installing your Evenflo LiteMax Sport Rear-Facing Infant Car Seat, our ParentLink® customer service experts offer help online in real time. Get live video support with a certified car seat safety technician to assist with proper vehicle installation, so you can drive with confidence. It's been 100 years and Evenflo continues to push the boundaries in baby and children’s gear design and innovation. We meet the needs of new generations of parents by focusing on what they really care about: leading-edge safety, smart design and technology, and convenient features that help them enjoy the journey of parenthood.
